thread.section_title: CosplayShopper Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CosplayShopper | cosplayshopper.com
thread.title: Matthew Osborne

author: Matthew Osborne
title: Matthew Osborne
text:
The website has an extensive range of anime/game/tv/film costumes to choose from, but the search function along with the image links of the genre you are looking at makes it a comparatively easy site to navigate.
Their prices are competitive with other similar sites, and they seem to have good reviews generally from other customers.
This is my first purchase from them, and the costumes look great.
The shipping was actually done on a deal of "Worldwide flat rate expedited shipping - Ship anywhere for just $19.50" so was not going to break the bank on getting the costumes to the UK...
Would buy again.
